title: Wagner: Η πρώτη εμφάνιση Σοϊγκού μετά την ανταρσία - Επιτήρησε επιχείρηση στην Ουκρανία
cleaned_sentences: Wagner: First Show Show after the rebellion - Surveillance a business in Ukraine According to a video broadcast by Russian Dimosia 24 TV 24, Soyigu, a target of Wagner's head of Wagner, Guvgeny Prigozin, went to a Russian administration center in Ukraine in Ukraine.
Images from Russia's Defense Minister Sergei Soigu, who inspected Russian forces in Ukraine, in his first public appearance after Wanger's failed rebellion, said Russia's state television.

According to a video broadcast by Russian TV Dicos Russia 24, Soigu, a target of fierce criticism of Wagner's leader Gevgeni Prigozin, went to a Russian administration center in Ukraine and "met with those in charge".

During this meeting, Sogu mainly emphasized "the great efficiency (of the Russian army) in identifying and destroying" weapons systems and "enemy soldiers", the Ministry of Defense said in a statement.

In the images broadcast by the state television network, the Russian minister seems to hear, in a calm and serious style, the reference to General Gevgeni Nikiforov, head of the Western Military District of the Russian Army, studying geographical maps and inspecting them.
